MessageColumn: Avoid words that express value judgements

RegexColumn: ([Tt]he present study|[Cc]lose proximity|both alike|[Aa] total of)

MessageColumn: Avoid the term "invalid" if referring to people
Avoid the term "retarded" if referring to people
Avoid periods with measurement units except in.
Do not use periods with routes of administration
Adverbs ending in "-ly" don't need hyphenation
Use of "in order..." may be wordy
Variations of "it's important" may be wordy

RegexColumn: ([Oo]n the other hand|[Aa]t the end of the day)

MessageColumn: "Used to" is wordy if used to make verbs past-tense
Phrases like "kind of" can dilute writing

RegexColumn: ([Ff]uture plans|[Ss]udden crisis|[Uu]nusual in nature|[Ee]xtreme in degree|[Vv]arious differences)
([Aa]t this moment in time|[Ee]veryday life|[Tt]hroughout history|[Ii]n this day and age|[Aa] level playing field|[Ii]n modern society|[Ii]n the final analysis)
([Dd]uring the course of|[Cc]ontinue on|[Ss]till remains|[Aa]t the present)
